Module capstone.schedulemanager
Package capstone.schedulemanager.utilities

Class helpers

java.lang.Object
capstone.schedulemanager.utilities.helpers
public abstract class helpers extends Object
This class provides methods to help access, organize, and output data features in the application.

  • Method Details

    • getZoneStrtHrConv

      public static int getZoneStrtHrConv(ZoneId zid)
      This method is used to return the start of business hours in UTC time according to the local zone ID
      Parameters:
      zid - The local zone ID
      Returns:
      hourStart The business start hour

    • getZoneEndHrConv

      public static int getZoneEndHrConv(ZoneId zid)
      This method is used to return the end of business hours in UTC time according to the local zone ID
      Parameters:
      zid - The local zone ID
      Returns:
      hourEnd The business end hour

    • isInvalidTimeDate

      public static boolean isInvalidTimeDate(Map<LocalDateTime,LocalDateTime> map, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      This method takes an empty hashmap and adds start and end time key value pairs to the map. The start and end times on the map are compared to input start and end times and returns true if any conditions are counted.
      Parameters:
      end - The end time to be compared
      map - The empty map to be filled
      start - The start time to be compared
      Returns:
      The boolean value for whether invalid

    • getCldrMonthName

      public static String getCldrMonthName(String monthNum)
      This method returns the name of a month from the input month number.
      Parameters:
      monthNum - The month number to be referenced for a name
      Returns:
      monthName The name of the month

    • getClndMonthNum

      public static String getClndMonthNum(String monthName)
      This method returns the number of a month from the input month name.
      Parameters:
      monthName - The month name to be referenced for a number
      Returns:
      monthNum The number of the month

    • getDelConfirm

      public static Optional<javafx.scene.control.ButtonType> getDelConfirm(String message)
      This method provides a confirmation message based on the input message that the confirmation message is referencing. Users can select from two buttons. One to confirm or cancel the action.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to output
      Returns:
      choice The option selected by the user

    • getAptDeleteSucsMesg

      public static void getAptDeleteSucsMesg(Appointments appointment)
      This method provides a message for the successful deletion of an appointment from a database. It prompts users with the appointment's ID and type. And requires that the user acknowledge the message by clicking on an OK button to exit the message and continue with the program.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment deleted

    • getCustDeleteSucsMesg

      public static void getCustDeleteSucsMesg(Customers customer)
      This method provides a message for the successful deletion of a customer from a database. It prompts users with the customer's ID and name. And requires that the user acknowledge the message by clicking on an OK button to exit the message and continue with the program.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer deleted

    • saveSuccessMessage

      public static void saveSuccessMessage(String message)
      This method prompts the user with a message stating that the information entered was successfully saved
      Parameters:
      message - The message to output

      public static void databsConErrMsg()
      This method provides an error message stating that there was a problem connecting to the database.

    • searchInfoAptsMsg

      public static void searchInfoAptsMsg()
      This method provides a message to users that there appointment search query was not found, and also the correct formats for entering name or date information into the appointments search text field.

    • searchInfoCustMesg

      public static void searchInfoCustMesg()
